fields.name: Data Sharing Support
fields.description: Does the service allow sharing of data by allowing users to upload files

fields.name: Data Capacity
fields.description: If yes to the above, what is the size of the file allowed

fields.name: Data Encryption at Rest
fields.description: Is the data encrypted once stored in the cloud

fields.name: Data Encryption in transit
fields.description: Is the data encrypted in transit, essentially do they use SSL

fields.name: Data Multi-tenancy
fields.description: Is the service multi-tenant?

fields.name: Encryption with Tenant Managed Keys (Data Mingling)
fields.description: Does the service allow usage of tenant specified keys for encrypting data at rest?

fields.name: Data Retention on Termination
fields.description: What happens to the tenant data once the tenant/SP terminates the contract

fields.name: Auto Sync of Data
fields.description: Does the service support auto-sync of data via desktop / mobile app

fields.name: Encryption Strength
fields.description: Key strength for encrypting data at rest?

fields.name: Password Policy Strength
fields.description: Do they support strong passwords?

fields.name: Anonymous Use
fields.description: Does the app allow anonymous use of the service?

fields.name: Multi-factor Aunthentication
fields.description: Does the SP support multi factor authentication?

fields.name: Jail Broken App
fields.description: If mobile app supported, does it have a jail broken version

fields.name: Mobile App Support
fields.description: Is there a mobile app for the service?

fields.name: Identity Federation Method
fields.description: Does the SP support SAML/OAuth for Id Federation?

fields.name: Enterprise Identity
fields.description: Does the service allow importing of enterprise identities for authentication, ex, from AD?

fields.name: SSO
fields.description: Is SSO supported?

fields.name: CSRF
fields.description: The vendor has implemented a systemic way to protect against CSRF attacks on all their services

fields.name: SQLi
fields.description: The vendor has implemented a systemic way to protect against SQLi attacks on all their services

fields.name: XSS
fields.description: The vendor has implemented a systemic way to protect against XSS attacks on all their services

fields.name: API Supported
fields.description: Does the Service Provider exposes APIs to access the functionality?

fields.name: IP Filtering Support
fields.description: Does the SP provide IP filtering, where in access to the service is restricted to the tenants IPs?

fields.name: Malware Site Use
fields.description: Does the SP site allow malwares?

fields.name: Service Hosting Locations
fields.description: In which geography is the service hosted?

fields.name: Compliance Certifications
fields.description: Does the service has any compliance certifications?

fields.name: Pricing Model
fields.description: What is the pricing model for the service?

fields.name: Price
fields.description: Pricing structure for the service

fields.name: Infrastructure Status Reporting
fields.description: Do they have a reporting mechanism for the health of their infrastructure?

fields.name: Business HQ
fields.description: Geography of the headquartes of the SP

fields.name: Admin Audit Logging
fields.description: Do they log all admin actions and if so what are the possible ways to access the logs?

fields.name: User Activity Logging
fields.description: Is all user activity logged and what access do the tenants get for these logs?

fields.name: Data Access Logging
fields.description: Is access to the data logged and how do tenants get access to these logs?

fields.name: Terms of Use
fields.description: Does the SP has a terms of use / service. If yes, is it different for various geographies?

fields.name: Data Residency
fields.description: Which geography is the data stored in?

fields.name: Service not in ITAR List
fields.description: Is the service in the list of ITAR countries and entities?

fields.name: Account Termination
fields.description: Who controls the termination of the service?

fields.name: IP Ownership
fields.description: Who owns the IP of the data / content?

fields.name: Privacy Policy
fields.description: What is the privacy policy for the data / content stored with the SP?

fields.name: Impacted by Compliance
fields.description: Is the service impacted by any compliance requirements?

fields.name: Dispute Resolution
fields.description: In case of dispute between the SP and the tenant, how is the dispute resolved and where

fields.name: Jursidictional Location
fields.description: In case of dispute between the SP and the tenant, what is the jurisdictional location

fields.name: Indemnity
fields.description: Is the tenant or SP indemnified against any wrong doing by either of them and what governs it?

fields.name: Service Address
fields.description: Business Addresses of the Service Provider

fields.name: API URL
fields.description: If yes to above, what is the end point of the API?
